Module maze
Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.Maze
  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    The Maze board, which keeps track of the Tiles and logic in the game.
    Author:
    Ian 300474717
